content.content: Hello PE CU! I am inspired by the vision of a decentralized stablecoin and the success Maker’s been enjoying. I wonder if there are a set of things for a community developer to help - be it smart contract testing, prototyping work etc. I am currently in between gigs so I do have quite a bit of time to learn and help. As background, I previously did enterprise backend develpoment with the JVM stack. I’d love to learn more solidity to help and get my feet wet contributing in Maker and Ethereum. Thanks,
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is a developer who is interested in contributing to the Maker and Ethereum communities. They are seeking feedback and opportunities to collaborate on decentralized stablecoin development.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal

content.content: Hi f-87, thanks for reaching out - let’s brainstorm a couple of ideas, I’ll DM you
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
